attributes.additional_details:
The time has come for British people to again have their say on whether they wish to stay as members of the EU or to leave,
For many years now this country has been putting Billions of pounds into a broke and corrupt organisation, at present we are putting in over £40 million PER DAY. At a time when the world economy is an such a bad state, WHY should the British people BE TOLD that they have to pay more, just so that other countries can take out more i.e. FRANCE. It is time for this Government to give us a referendum on whether we want to stay in or LEAVE the EU.
